text: I was expecting the PDF to be bigger but not 1000x bigger. I tried to convert the SVG with (command line) inkscape to compare but it just rasterized it

text: If you're using  transparency I think PDF files can be bigger than if they're not.

text: You're right using white instead of a transparent make the file size go down from 170Mo to 86Mo

text: Contourf is exactly the poly /mesh issue

text: I'll try to push a fix later

text: Oh and the svg probably falls back to rasterizing the meshes because they are outside of spec, which is why it's so much smaller.

elements.text: Oh and the svg probably falls back to rasterizing the meshes because they are outside of spec, which is why it's so much smaller.

text: Can you try the latest version? It should have much lower file sizes. The current tradeoff is that interactively changing the contourf will be buggy again, but that is a deeper issue with the poly primitive and should be handled separately
